channel.title: Whats up with the run client?
channel.description:
Everytime someone with a windows 7 and a more up to date windows vista tries to run the client, the client can't find the "java", I've told them to download the recent version of java, so they do.... This still doesn't work... Here is the run code: @echo off java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause
I am using a 562 loading a 562. Everyone with a older version of windows vista and a windows xp can use the server. Could someone please tell me what's wrong and/or give me the code for a 64-bit client. Thank you.

item.title: Whats up with the run client?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

Everytime someone with a windows 7 and a more up to date windows vista tries to run the client, the client can’t find the “java”, I’ve told them to download the recent version of java, so they do… This still doesn’t work…
Here is the run code:
@echo off
java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0
pause

I am using a 562 loading a 562.
Everyone with a older version of windows vista and a windows xp can use the server.
Could someone please tell me what’s wrong and/or give me the code for a 64-bit client.
Thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats up with the run client?
